pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Simulation for Life Science and Breeding // Data simulator including genotype, phenotype, pedigree, selection and reproduction in R. It simulates most of reproduction process of animals or plants and provides data for GS (Genomic Selection), GWAS (Genome-Wide Association Study), and Breeding. For ADI model, please see Kao C and Zeng Z (2002) doi:10.1093/genetics/160.3.1243. For build.cov, please see B. D. Ripley (1987) ISBN:9780470009604.
